response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and significance, not just to us, but also to you, given its worth of $800,000 to you. I understand the importance of making a fair deal, especially when it involves such a significant investment. Therefore, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a remarkable opportunity to secure a piece that could potentially appreciate in value over time. I trust that this proposal will meet your expectations and aligns with your financial considerations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
